fullplot: After returning from a wedding reception, a couple staying in an isolated vacation house receive a knock on the door in the mid-hours of the night. What ensues is a violent invasion by three strangers, their faces hidden behind masks. The couple find themselves in a violent struggle, in which they go beyond what either of them thought capable in order to survive.
plot: A young couple staying in an isolated vacation home are terrorized by three unknown assailants.
title: The Strangers

tomatoes.consensus: The Strangers provides a few scares, but offers little else to distinguish itself from other slasher films.
